page.title: 04SNOWDOWN_THE WINDING SHAFT.
page.content: When we went to the coal mine we saw the cages which carry the miners to the coal seams. The man at the controls showed us how it worked. Next we saw how the coal cars are emptied.First the car goes into the tippler which turns it upside down to empty all the coal out. Then it goes up a conveyor belt which was like a hill with a big chain in the middle of itt to pull the coal cars up.Finally the cars went around a turn_table and back into the cage to be sent down to collect more coal.
